text: "The idea that people can agree to disagree is kind of missing from everything," Barr said. "Conflict resolution and agreeing to disagree are important things. That's what we need to do as a country — figure out what we don't like and talk to each other and discuss how we're going to get it changed or fixed. I hope [the show] opens up civil conversation between people and not just mudslinging. We need to be more civilized than that."
title: President Trump calls Roseanne Barr with congrats on 'Roseanne' reboot's ratings win

meta_data.description: Roseanne Barr called her phone call with President Trump "a friendly conversation about working, television, and ratings," adding that he "really understands ratings and how they measure things."
